text.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:17.3333px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;text-anchor:middle;fill:#e0e0e0
